name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-angular-search
title: Search Client-Side Web Part Built with Angular v1.x
shortDescription: This is a sample search web part that illustrates how you can use Angular within the new SharePoint Framework
longDescription: This is a sample search web part that illustrates how you can use Angular within the new SharePoint Framework

thumbnails.alt: Search Client-Side Web Part Built with Angular v1.x

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
